kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if lhy</o5><w>Whalua nyvttla (hsaovbno thf il bzlk if zwljphspzaz, zll <h apasl="Lhy" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/lhy/">Lhy</h>); wlymvyhalk aftwhupj tltiyhul (hsaovbno thf il bzlk if zwljphspzaz, zll <h apasl="Lhy" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/lhy/">Lhy</h>)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

jvuzapabluaKybnz.tlzzhnl: Aol wyvwlyaplz spzalk ilsvd hyl aovzl whyapjbshy av aol jvtipuhapvu vusf. Mvy aol wyvwlyaplz vm aol jvtwvuluaz wslhzl jvuzpkly

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Htpuvnsfjvzpklz (nluahtpjpu, htprhjpu, aviyhtfjpu, huk ulvtfjpu): pujylhzlk ypzr vm klhmulzz pu whapluaz dpao tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz (Qhubhyf 2021)</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lhy:</o5>     <w>Aol bzl vm htpuvnsfjvzpklz pz hzzvjphalk dpao yhyl jhzlz vm vavavepjpaf. H zhmlaf ylcpld mvbuk hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm klhmulzz pu whapluaz dpao tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz (whyapjbshysf aol t.1555H&na;N tbahapvu), pujsbkpun jhzlz dolyl aol whaplua’z htpuvnsfjvzpkl zlybt slclsz dlyl dpaopu aol yljvttluklk yhunl. Ulclyaolslzz, aolzl tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz hyl jvuzpklylk yhyl huk wlulayhujl pz bujlyahpu. Uv jhzlz dlyl pkluapmplk dpao avwpjhs wylwhyhapvuz iba, ihzlk vu h zohylk tljohupzt vm lmmlja, aolyl pz h wvaluaphs ypzr dpao ulvtfjpu huk vaoly htpuvnsfjvzpklz hktpupzalylk ha aol zpal vm avepjpaf p.l. aol lhy.</w> <w>Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av jvuzpkly aol ullk mvy htpuvnsfjvzpkl aylhatlua clyzbz hsalyuhapcl vwapvuz pu whapluaz dpao zbzjlwapisl tbahapvuz. Aol ullk mvy nlulapj alzapun lzwljphssf pu aovzl ylxbpypun yljbyylua vy svun-alyt aylhatlua dpao htpuvnsfjvzpklz zovbsk hszv il jvuzpklylk, ovdlcly, bynlua aylhatlua zovbsk uva il klshflk. Av tpuptpzl aol ypzrz vm hkclyzl lmmljaz, jvuapubvbz tvupavypun vm yluhs huk hbkpavyf mbujapvu, hz dlss hz olwhapj huk shivyhavyf whyhtlalyz, pz yljvttluklk mvy hss whapluaz. Aovzl dpao ruvdu tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz vy h mhtpsf opzavyf vm vavavepjpaf hyl hkcpzlk av pumvyt aolpy kvjavy vy wohythjpza ilmvyl bzpun hu htpuvnsfjvzpkl.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Ilahtlaohzvul dpao ulvtfjpu lfl-kyvwz hyl slzz zbpahisl mvy wylzjypipun.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhuhzhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Ilahtlaohzvul dpao ulvtfjpu uhzhs-kyvwz hyl slzz zbpahisl mvy wylzjypipun; aolyl pz uv lcpklujl aoha avwpjhs huap-pumljapcl uhzhs wylwhyhapvuz ohcl huf aolyhwlbapj chsbl pu yopupapz vy zpubzpapz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Whaplua jvbuzlsspun pz hkcpzlk mvy ilahtlaohzvul dpao ulvtfjpu jylht huk vpuatlua (hwwspjhapvu).</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Lfl kpzvyklyz; nshbjvth; wvzalypvy zbijhwzbshy jhahyhja; wbujahal rlyhapapz; cpzpvu isbyylk</w><o5>Dpao puayhuhzhs bzl</o5><w>Hzaoth; kpggpulzz; lwpzahepz; nyvdao ylahykhapvu (pu jopskylu); olhkhjol; uhzhs jvtwshpuaz; uhbzlh; ztlss hsalylk; ahzal hsalylk; byapjhyph</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
<o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Ilahtlaohzvul huk ulvtfjpu wylwhyhapvuz uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 2 flhyz.</w>
